name: Sally
descriptions: Sally is a child abductee aboard Mothership Zeta in the year 2277.

Sally and her sister were abducted shortly after the bombs dropped in 2077. Her parents were killed almost immediately after the war, leaving the two girls to themselves. After the abduction, the girls were separated, and Sally never learned that her sister died during one of the aliens' many experiments. She has blocked out most of the bad things that happened to her and is now a fixture in the lower levels of the ship, repeatedly escaping custody and exploring the ship's lower level. She has a degree of insight into the workings of the Mothership and the motives of the aliens that nobody else possesses.
The fact that Sally was abducted during the Great War makes her more than 200 years old. Sally also offers random alien items once every few hours, should the Lone Wanderer request them.

Not of This World/Among the Stars/This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough...: Sally assists the Lone Wanderer throughout the Mothership Zeta quests by using her skills to open doors or to provide information as they move through the ship.
Sally appears only in the Fallout 3 add-on Mothership Zeta.

topics.topic_text: So what are these generators? How do they work?
topics.response_text: Oh, you'll know them when you see them.Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05convtlsall_0000a…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05convtlsall_0000a6f6_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Let's get back to the core.
topics.response_text: Sure, there's a teleporter nearby that I found. Race ya!Play soundDlc05ff01_dlc05ff01goodbye_00007…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01goodbye_00007eb1_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Thanks for nothing, Sally.
topics.response_text: Hey, it's not like this was a wasted trip. Check out the storage closet I found here.Play soundDlc05ff01_dlc05ff01retrosp_00007…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01retrosp_00007eaf_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Well, that was... fun.  What now?
topics.response_text: Let's get back to the core and never speak of this again.Play soundDlc05ff01_dlc05ff01whatnow_00007…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01whatnow_00007eb7_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Let's go back the way we came.
topics.response_text: You really must have hit your head. Unless you're Captain Cosmos and have a rocket pack we can use, that's not happening.Play soundDlc05ff01_dlc05ff01xbackup_00007…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01xbackup_00007eb6_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I'm fine. No thanks to you.

topics.topic_text: I'm all right. How about you?

topics.topic_text: What did you get us into this time?

topics.topic_text: Let's just get out of here.

topics.topic_text: We're lost, aren't we?
topics.response_text: No way! Well, maybe a little. I bet we can find something neat, though!Play soundDlc05ff01_dlc05ff01ylost_0000aac…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01ylost_0000aac4_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: What an incredible smell you've discovered...
topics.response_text: Yeah, it is kinda stinky in here... Did you cut the cheese?{it IS kinda stinky...}Play soundDlc05ff01_dlc05ff01ysmells_0000a…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01ysmells_0000aac7_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: What are these things?
topics.response_text: I've seen these all over. They put people in them, and the people go to sleep. They stay asleep for a really long time, too.Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallycryo_0000a…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallycryo_0000a719_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Who are these people?
topics.response_text: I don't know. I've never talked to them. Sometimes I'd come and look at them, and wonder why they're dressed like that.Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallycryo_0000a…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallycryo_0000a71a_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Why do we need a 'spaceman' to help us?
topics.response_text: Well, because he's got a spacesuit! Can't go out in space without one. And if we're going to escape, we need to go outside.Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallycryo_0000a…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallycryo_0000a716_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Okay, let's talk to the astronaut.
topics.response_text: This is going to be so neat!Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallycryo_0000a…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallycryo_0000a718_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Okay, kid. Lead the way.
topics.response_text: Great!Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallygree_00003…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallygree_000036de_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: You should wait here. It's too dangerous for a little girl.
topics.response_text: No it's not. They almost never catch me. You'll see.Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallygree_00004…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallygree_00004e58_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I think I've got this under control.
topics.response_text: I can help, honest!Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallygree_00004…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallygree_00004e56_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: How exactly are you going to help?
topics.response_text: Watch, you'll see.Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallygree_00004…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallygree_00004e55_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Sorry for doubting you. Can you help now?
topics.response_text: Sure!Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallygree_00004…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallygree_00004e54_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Thanks, kid. We're getting out of here -- you want to come with us?
topics.response_text: Sure! I love exploring, and it's been a while since I've been out and about.Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallygree_00006…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallygree_00006de0_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: How did you do that?
topics.response_text: There's wires and stuff inside the wall there. A while ago I learned which ones to put together to make the doors work.Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallygree_00006…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallygree_00006ddf_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Listen, we're all in danger if we stay here.
topics.response_text: Oh, I know. They're always mad when they find out I've been out of my cell. They're gonna be REALLY mad when they see what you did.Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallygree_00006…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallygree_00006de1_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: How do you know so much about this place?
topics.response_text: Oh, I've been here a while. A long while.Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallytlho_00007…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallytlho_000076b8_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Are you all alone? Where's your family?
topics.response_text: I don't have any family anymore.Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallytlwh_00007…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallytlwh_000076b1_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Do you know where we're going?
topics.response_text: Sure!Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1tlsallywh_00007…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1tlsallywh_000076b7_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Do you know anything helpful about the other sections of the ship?
topics.response_text: It's a pretty big place, and I've only seen some of it. They always catch me before I can see the whole thing.Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tllevelkn_00003…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tllevelkn_00003973_4.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Why can't you do your vent trick and open the door to the decompression chamber?
topics.response_text: Hey! If I could I would! Some of the vents are so small in there, even I can't crawl through them.Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlsallydo_0000a…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlsallydo_0000acf8_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: What do you know about this Toshiro Kago guy?
topics.response_text: Ummm, I think he's from the earth's past. There are people frozen all over the ship that the aliens grabbed wearing funny old time clothes and stuff.Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlsamurai_00007…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlsamurai_00007a69_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: There's a teleporter to the bridge, but it doesn't work.

topics.topic_text: Okay, you wait here. I'll see if I can find the controls.

topics.topic_text: Forget the teleporter. Let's just go.
topics.response_text: That doesn't seem like a very good idea.Play soundDlc05mz3_dlc05mz3sallytele_00007…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3sallytele_00007e1d_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: You sure this is a good idea?
topics.response_text: I think so. Seems like they're getting even more angry at us.Play soundDlc05mz3_dlc05mz3sallytele_00007…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3sallytele_00007e1e_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Thanks for your help. Couldn't have done it without you.
topics.response_text: I know. And you're very welcome.Play soundDlc05post_dlc05postgreet1_0000a7…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05post_dlc05postgreet1_0000a74c_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: What will you do now?
topics.response_text: I think I'm going to stay here for a while. I don't think I'd like it much down there anymore, and there's still a bunch of the ship I haven't seen.Play soundDlc05post_dlc05postgreet2_0000a7…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05post_dlc05postgreet2_0000a74e_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Anything to report?
topics.response_text: Nope, I'll go back out and look for more stuff soon.Play soundDlc05post_dlc05pqtlreport_0000ab…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05post_dlc05pqtlreport_0000ab5e_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: How's life in space?

topics.topic_text: I'll handle this.

topics.topic_text: Why can't I use the door to get off the bridge?
topics.response_text: Well, we were just in a really big space battle with a UFO... the ship is probably pretty damaged.Play soundDlc05post_dlc05tlbridgedoo_0000a…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05post_dlc05tlbridgedoo_0000abf2_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: I guess they're already looking for us... I can sneak past them in the vents, but you're too big to fit. We'll have to figure out how to get around.Play soundDlc05steamworksld_greeting_00007…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05steamworksld_greeting_00007b95_1.oggnoicon

conversation.response_text: They just took out our shields!Play soundDlc05bridg_dlc05bridgeelli_00007…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgeelli_00007031_1.oggnoicon
Lights out! They must have hit something and now nothing is working!Play soundDlc05bridg_dlc05bridgeemph_00007…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgeemph_00007030_1.oggnoicon

Lights out, they killed our power!  Maybe there's some buttons or something around here to restart this hunk of junk.Play soundDlc05bridg_dlc05bridgeemph_0000a…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgeemph_0000a928_1.oggnoicon

I got it!  The deathray is working and will be fully charged in 30 seconds!Play soundDlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_00005aeb_1.oggnoicon

And I'll go over here. I can be Stella Skyfire! She was Captain Cosmos' weapons specialist, back in season 2. This is great!Play soundDlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000a…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000a887_1.oggnoicon
Play soundDlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000a…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000ab39_1.oggnoicon

Wow! This looks just like the bridge on Captain Cosmos!  I know what to do!Play soundDlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000a…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000a8c4_1.oggnoicon
Try hitting some buttons, one of them has to do something.Play soundDlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_00007…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000704d_1.oggnoicon
I never thought I'd get to do something like this!Play soundDlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000a…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000a993_1.oggnoicon
I've got a lock on their ship, fire when ready!Play soundDlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000a…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000ab41_1.oggnoicon
We're at about 70%.Play soundDlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_00007…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_00007041_1.oggnoicon
Sure, what did ya want?Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05convsallya_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05convsallya_00005407_1.oggnoicon
Yeah. My sister. I think she's on this ship somewhere.Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05convsallya_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05convsallya_0000540c_1.oggnoicon

We were together when the aliens took us from home. I saw her on the table next to mine when I woke up on this ship.Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05convsallya_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05convsallya_00005406_1.oggnoicon
Then you stand WAY back, because it gets really hot and goes 'kaboom'!Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05convsallyg_0000a…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05convsallyg_0000a6f0_1.oggnoicon

Wow! So you got to ride horses? Real, living horses? I've never even seen a real living horse. What are they like?Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05convsallyr_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05convsallyr_000053fb_1.oggnoicon
That's funny, sounds like the way people can be too!Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05convsallyr_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05convsallyr_0000541e_1.oggnoicon
Aw, don't worry. I always pick good friends.Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05convsallyr_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05convsallyr_000053f3_1.oggnoicon
Aliens! Look out!Play soundDlc05ff01_dlc05ff01xcartal_00007…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01xcartal_00007453_1.oggnoicon
Cows? We got cows!Play soundDlc05ff01_dlc05ff01xcartco_00007…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01xcartco_00007454_1.oggnoicon

Oh, I get it! We're in one of their trash cans that move around the ship. I always wondered where these things go...Play soundDlc05ff01_dlc05ff01xcartfi_00007…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01xcartfi_00007ebb_1.oggnoicon
Hey, we're moving... Cool!Play soundDlc05ff01_dlc05ff01xcartge_00007…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01xcartge_00007452_1.oggnoicon
We're stuck. Let me see if I can figure something out.Play soundDlc05ff01_dlc05ff01xcartge_0000a…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01xcartge_0000a899_1.oggnoicon
Do you think we were noticed?Play soundDlc05ff01_dlc05ff01xcartsa_00007…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05ff01_dlc05ff01xcartsa_00007eb4_1.oggnoicon

Well, not really shut it off... More like blow it up. If you turn off the coolant, it'll get really hot and then explode, so be careful, okay?Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1generator_0000b…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1generator_0000b40e_1.oggnoicon
Hello? Hi! Hi there! Listen, can you let me out of here?Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallyrele_00003…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1sallyrele_0000330a_1.oggnoicon
Sorry, I should get the door. Hang on, okay?Play soundDlc05mz3_dlc05mz3exlabscen_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3exlabscen_000058a7_1.oggnoicon
Wow!Play soundDlc05mz3_dlc05mz3exlabscen_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3exlabscen_00005743_1.oggnoicon

Looks like this door's locked, too. Hang on, I'll see if I can get it from the other side.Play soundDlc05mz3_dlc05mz3sallylabt_00003…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3sallylabt_00003ca4_1.oggnoicon

Okay! That should do it! I'll be back out in a minute!{from inside wall vent}Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05sallyventsay_0000a…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05sallyventsay_0000acf9_1.oggnoicon
